name: Major Regeneration
text: Hinder yourself using Vitality. Use your Min die. Recover health equal to your Max+Mid dice.

name: Paragon Feat
text: Overcome using [power] in a situation that requires you to be more than humanly capable, like an extreme feat of strength or speed. Use your Max+Min dice. Boost all nearby allies with your Mid die.

name: Push Your Limits
text: You have no limit on amount of Reactions you can take. Each time you use a Reaction after the first one each turn, take 1 irreducible damage or take a minor twist.

name: Reactive Strike
text: When you are Attacked and dealt damage, you may Attack the source of that damage by rolling your single [power] die, plus the amount of damage you take.

name: Charged Up Blast
text: Attack using [power] and at least one bonus. Use your Max+Mid+Min dice. Destroy all of your bonuses, adding each of them to this Attack first, even if they are exclusive.

name: Eruption
text: Attack up to three targets one of which must be you using [power]. Assign your Min, Mid, and Max dice as you choose among those targets.

name: Improved Immunity
text: If you would take damage from [Element/Energy], ignore that damage and Recover that amount instead. Use the value of the damage to Boost yourself.

name: Powerful Strike
text: Attack using [power]. Use your Max+Mid dice.

name: Purification
text: Remove all bonuses and penalties from the scene. You cannot use this ability again this scene.

name: Summoned Allies
text: Use [power] to create a number of minions equal to your Mid die. Choose the one same basic action that they each perform. They all act at the start of your turn.

name: Charged Up Blast
text: Attack using [Signature Weapon] and at least one bonus. Use your Max+Mid+Min dice. Destroy all of your bonuses, adding each of them to this Attack first, even if they are exclusive.

name: Quick Exit
text: Attack using [Signature Vehicle]. Use your Max die. Hinder each nearby opponent with your Mid die. After using this ability, you and up to 2 allies may end up anywhere in the scene, even outside of the action.

name: Sacrificial Ram
text: Attack up to three nearby targets using [Signature Vehicle]. Use your Max+Mid dice against each of them. You cannot use your Signature Vehicle power for the rest of this scene and until it is recovered/repaired.

name: Ultimate Weaponry
text: Boost yourself using [power]. Use your Max die. That bonus is persistent and exclusive. Attack using your Mid die plus that bonus.

name: Calculated Dodge
text: You may take 1 irreducible damage to reroll the dice pool of a target that is Attacking or Hindering you.

name: Give Time
text: Boost another hero using [power]. If that hero has already acted for the turn, use your Max die, and that hero loses Health equal to your Min die. That hero acts next in the turn order

name: Reliable Aptitude
text: When taking any action using [power], you may reroll your Min die before determining effects.

name: Unerring Strike
text: Attack using [power]. Use your Max+Min dice. Ignore all penalties on this attack, ignore any Defend actions, and it cannot be affected by Reactions.

name: Field of Hazards
text: Hinder any number of targets in the scene using [power]. Use your Max+Min dice. If you roll doubles, also Attack each target using your Mid die.

name: Impenetrable Defense
text: Defend using [power] against all Attacks against you until your next turn using your Max+Mid dice.

name: Like the Wind
text: When you are Attacked and dealt damage, you may ignore that damage completely. If you do, treat the value of the damage as a Hinder action against you instead.

name: Powerful Strike
text: Attack using [power]. Use your Max+Mid dice.

text: Use [power] to create a number of minions equal to your Mid die. Choose the one same basic action that they each perform. They all act at the start of your turn.

name: Calculated Dodge
text: You may take 1 irreducible damage to reroll the dice pool of a target that is Attacking or Hindering you.

name: Heroic Interruption
text: When an Attack deals damage to a nearby hero in the Red zone, you may take d6 irreducible damage to redirect that Attack to a target of your choice, other than the source of the Attack.

name: Intercession
text: When multiple nearby heroes are Attacked, you may take all the damage instead. If you do, roll your [power] die + Red zone die and Defend against the Attack by the total.

name: Take Down
text: Attack using [power]. Use your Max die. Then, Hinder that target using your Mid+Min dice.

name: Untouchable Movement
text: Boost yourself using [power]. Use your Max+Min dice. Then, you may end up anywhere else in the scene, avoiding any dangers between your starting and ending locations.

name: Dangerous Hinder
text: Hinder using [power]. Use your Max+Mid dice. If you roll doubles, also Attack the target using your Mid+Min dice and take damage equal to your Min die.

name: Dire Control
text: Select a minion. That minion is now entirely under your control and acts at the start of your turn. If you are incapacitated, you lose control of this minion. You may also choose to release control of this minion at any time. At the end of the scene, this minion is defeated.

name: Final Wrath
text: Attack using [power]. Use your Max+Mid+Min dice. Take a major twist.

name: Impenetrable Defense
text: Defend using [power] with your Max+Mid dice against all Attacks against you until your next turn.

name: Impossible Knowledge
text: At the start of your turn, change any penalty into a bonus.

name: Summoned Allies
text: Use [power] to create a number of minions equal to your Mid die. Choose the one same basic action that they each perform. They all act at the start of your turn.

name: Change Self
text: At the start of your turn, swap two of your power dice. They stay swapped until changed again or the scene ends.

name: Empowerment
text: Whenever you are dealt damage, roll your single [power] die to Defend against the Attack and Boost yourself

text: Defend using [power] with your Max+Mid dice against all Attacks against you until your next turn.

name: Defensive Deflection
text: When you would be dealt damage, you may roll your single [power] die as a Defend against that damage and as an Attack against a nearby target other than the source of that damage.

name: Mutable Form
text: Choose three basic actions. Use [power] in your pool and take one action with your Max die, a different action with your Mid die, and a third action with your Min die.

name: Powerful Strike
text: Attack using [power]. Use your Max+Mid dice.

name: Resurrection
text: Once per issue, if you would go to 0 Health, roll [power] + [any Physical or Mental quality] + Red zone die. Your Health becomes that number

text: Use [power] to create a number of minions equal to your Mid die. Choose the one same basic action that they each perform. They all act at the start of your turn.

name: Combustion
text: Attack multiple nearby targets using [power]. Use your Max+Mid dice. Take irreducible damage equal to your Min die.

name: Final Wrath

name: Full Defensive
text: Hinder yourself by rolling your single [power] die. You are immune to damage until the start of your next turn. You cannot use this ability again this scene.

name: Ultimate Weaponry
text: Boost yourself using [power]. Use your Max die. That bonus is persistent and exclusive. Then, Attack using your Mid die plus that bonus.

name: Unload
text: Attack multiple targets using [power], using your Max+Min dice. If you roll doubles, take a minor twist or damage equal to your Mid die.

name: Critical Eye
text: Select a target. Boost using [quality]. Use your Max+Mid+Min dice. That bonus must be used against that target before the end of your next turn, or it is wasted.

name: Discern Weakness
text: Remove a bonus on a target. Hinder that target using [quality]. Use your Max die, and that penalty is persistent and exclusive.

name: Reliable Aptitude
text: When taking any action using [quality], you may reroll your Min die before determining effects.

name: Specialized Info
text: Overcome using [quality]. Use your Max+Min dice.

name: Aware Response
text: After an opponent Attacks or Hinders you or a nearby ally, Attack the opponent by rolling your single [quality] die.

name: Canny Awareness
text: Overcome using [quality]. Use your Max+Min dice. Hinder all nearby opponents with your Mid die.

name: Considered Planning
text: Boost using [quality] and use your Max die. Defend against all Attacks against you using your Mid die until your next turn. Note your Min die: as a Reaction, until your next turn, you may Hinder an attacker using that die.

name: Final Wrath
text: Attack using [quality]. Use your Max+Mid+Min dice. Take a major twist.

name: Harmony
text: As long as you have at least one bonus created from [quality], treat [power] die as one size higher (max d12).

name: Purification
text: Remove all bonuses and penalties from the scene. You cannot use this ability again this scene.

name: Book It
text: Hinder any number of close targets using [quality]. Use your Max die. End your turn elsewhere in the scene.

name: Endurance Fighting
text: Whenever you Attack a target with an action, also Hinder that target with your Min die.

name: Finishing Blow
text: Attack using [quality]. Use your Max die. Remove any number of penalties from the target. Add your Min die to the Attack each time you remove a penalty.

name: Reactive Defense
text: When an opponent Attacks, you may become the target of that Attack and Defend by rolling your single [quality] die.

name: Heroic Sacrifice
text: When an opponent Attacks, you may become the target of the Attack and Defend by rolling your single Red zone die.

name: Inspiring Totem
text: When you use an ability action, you may also perform any one basic action using your Mid die on the same roll.

name: Lead by Example
text: Make a basic action using [quality.] Use your Max die. All other heroes who take the same basic action on their turn against the same target receive a Boost from your Mid+Min dice.

name: Ultimatum
text: Hinder using [quality]. Use your Max+Min dice. Boost yourself or an ally with your Mid die.
